game.name: PAYDAY 2: Midland Ranch Heist
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 페이데이 갱이 제마 맥셰이와 계약한 작업을 완수하기 위해 텍사스로 향합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Payday Gang head to Texas to complete a job for Gemma McShay.
